title: Offerings for Appointed Festivals
summary: Numbers 29 continues the instructions for offerings, focusing on special festivals like the Feast of Trumpets, the Day of Atonement, and the Feast of Tabernacles. Each feast includes detailed sacrifices.

faq.question: Which feasts are included in this chapter?
faq.answer: Feast of Trumpets, Day of Atonement, and Feast of Tabernacles.

faq.question: Were these offerings optional?
faq.answer: No, they were commanded by God and tied to Israelâ€™s worship calendar.
